title: 1960s美国高中课堂的纪律运动模拟

action: Stand for morning pledge with proper posture and hand over heart
speech: I pledge allegiance to the flag of the United States of America...
thoughts: It's important to follow the rules and set a good example. Mr. Johnson expects everyone to participate fully in the morning pledge. I don't want to stand out or get in trouble.
